Dear Ms. Lewis:
Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above
referenced facility.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the local office at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Kari Muntean, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
22 Center Street

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB460308844
Licensee Name: Catholic Charities of Jacksn, Lenw, & Hillsd
Licensee Address: 199 North Broad Street
Adrian, MI 49221
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 263-2191
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Suzanne Lewis, Designee
Name of Facility: Catholic Charities of Jackson, Lenawee &
Hillsdale
Facility Address: 199 N. Broad St.
Adrian, MI 49221
Facility Telephone #: (517) 263-2191
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency requested approval for a satellite office to be located at 3425 Francis St.
Jackson, MI 49203.
III. Methodology
On-site inspection was completed on 12/20/2016.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The office space was reviewed and consisted of numerous offices, visitation space,
meeting/conference room and storage space. There was locked storage available
for confidential information. The space is suitable to the purposes of the agency. It is
expected that the agency will provide supervision, on-site, at least 2 days per week,
as required in the CPA licensing rules.
V. Recommendation
I recommend no change to the current license status.
May 22, 2017
________________________________________
Kari Muntean Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved by:
May 24, 2017
_______________________________________
Claudia Triestram Date
Area Manager
